verses.name: 2 Kings 14:17
verses.text: And Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah lived after the death of Jehoash son of Jehoahaz king of Israel fifteen years.

verses.name: 2 Kings 14:18
verses.text: And the rest of the acts of Amaziah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 2 Kings 14:19
verses.text: Now they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem: and he fled to Lachish; but they sent after him to Lachish, and slew him there.

verses.name: 2 Kings 14:20
verses.text: And they brought him on horses: and he was buried at Jerusalem with his fathers in the city of David.
